title: How your team can finish the split

replies.body: I found out that i can buy team icons.Can i press ctrl+6 to show those icons in game?

No, that was only for the worlds tournament only. Pressing control+6 in game now will show an icon above your champion but it will be the mastery level of the champion not the summoner icon of the team.
SIN Gaming seems to be missing here, can they only finish as low as third?
they can finish 2nd if they beat chief i believe
